REVERSE.ACTION_2_2: was created with equal and opposite values to reverse transaction {{trans_id}}
REVERSE.AUTHORISED_BY: Reversal document was authorised by user:
REVERSE.CONFIGURED_FOR: Please confirm that you authorise reversing transaction:
REVERSE.DESCRIPTION: Transaction reversed using Administrative Voucher Tools
REVERSE.DETAILS: This transaction will be marked in the system as reversed. A new voucher document will be created with equal and opposite values to reverse any movement of assets.
REVERSE.TITLE: Reverse Transaction

CORRECT.ACTION_2_2: was created with equal and opposite values to reverse transaction {{trans_id}}
CORRECT.ACTION_3_2: was created with corrections provided by this tool
CORRECT.AUTHORISED_BY: Voucher documents were authorised by user:
CORRECT.CONFIGURED_FOR: The transaction {{trans_id}} will not be edited as it has already been posted. This will create a reversal voucher followed by a second voucher with the corrections made here. Please confirm that you authorise the above corrections to {{trans_id}}.
CORRECT.DESCRIPTION: Transaction corrected using Administrative Voucher Tools
CORRECT.DETAILS: This transaction can now be updated with corrections. Submitting this process will create two voucher documents, one reversing the effects of this transaction with equal and opposite values, the second with rows reflecting corrections made here.
CORRECT.SUCCESS: Transaction reversal and correction documents were written successfully
CORRECT.TITLE: Correct Transaction
